docs.title: locom v0.0.3-poc
docs.text:
Welcome to the pre-release documentation for locom. This is a proof of concept site showing how we’ll publish docs for each version.

👉 For installation and usage, see Install & Setup.

👉 CLI reference (to be generated automatically in the future): CLI Reference.

docs.title: CLI Reference
docs.text: This is a placeholder for locom v0.0.3-poc command reference. Future versions will have this page auto-generated from the tool’s --help output.
